entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or a few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
